channel.title: soil taxonomy on humus.rocks - soil is life on the rocks
channel.description: Recent content in soil taxonomy on humus.rocks - soil is life on the rocks

item.title: Soil Taxonomy Graph Database with neo4j and cypher
item.description: MATCH (taxn:Taxon { title: 'TypicHumixerepts' })-[:CHILD_OF]-(prnt)-[:CHILD_OF]-(sibs) WHERE sibs.taxlevel = taxn.taxlevel RETURN [prnt,sibs]
